attributes.action: Lower the cost of vet bills to reduce the amount of neglected pets
attributes.additional_details: To lower the costs for animals in need of treatment via vets. These costs can run into thousands if not more even for monthly installments. Aswell as this there would be less abandoned and non castrated pets about which would help the vets become less busy in time.
attributes.background: For the Government to look at an NHS like system to lower the costs for animals in need of treatment through vets. The monthly payments can be costly or non-existent with some vets.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions: 

Regulate veterinary practices to help make them more affordable
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705499

Fund a veterinary service for pets so people don’t have to pay vet fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700344
